reactImportMandatory.name: React Import is Mandatory
reactImportMandatory.rule: Every story file MUST include 'import React from 'react';' as the FIRST import. This is non-negotiable for JSX to work.

details.why: JSX syntax requires React to be in scope. Without this import, stories will fail with 'React is not defined' error.
details.where: First line of imports, before any other imports

automaticFix.description: The system will automatically add 'import React from 'react';' if it detects JSX without React import

implementation.validation: Story validation will check for React import when JSX is present
implementation.autoFix: Missing React imports will be automatically added during generation
implementation.promptGuidance: AI prompts emphasize React import as the first mandatory import
